overview: Dr Ramchandra Sare has achieved everything in his life.But his family doesn't have time for him his wife Janaki is busy attending kitty parties where as is son Lakshya and daughter Kishori are only spending his hard earned money.Chandu is best friend of Ramchandra who earns his living by driving an auto rickshaw but lives a peaceful life with his wife Chandini and son Rahul.Chandu and Ramchandra once go for boating where Ramchandra drowns in the lake.
title: Ram Rahim
